hero.headline: How to Create and Optimize YouTube Playlists
hero.subheadline: Organize content, boost watch time, and improve discoverability with strategic playlists.

sections.content: Playlists organize your content and keep viewers watching longer. They appear in search results, can be featured on your channel page, and auto-play through your videos. A good playlist strategy improves both viewer experience and algorithm performance.

faq.question: How many playlists should I have?
faq.answer: Depends on content variety. Start with 3-5 core topic playlists. Add more as your content library grows. Don't over-segment.

faq.question: Should every video be in a playlist?
faq.answer: Yes, ideally. Every video should belong to at least one playlist. Some videos fit multiple playlists. Organize everything.

faq.question: Do playlists help algorithm?
faq.answer: Yes. Playlist watch sessions signal content quality. They rank in search. Featured playlists improve channel page performance.

faq.question: Can I add other creators' videos?
faq.answer: Yes. Curated playlists can include any public video. Good for topic collections. But focus on your content for channel growth.
